title: MNST Makes Bullish Cross Above Critical Moving Average - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Monster Beverage Corp (Symbol: MNST) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $58.70, changing hands as high as $58.99 per share. Monster Beverage Corp shares are currently trading up about 1.3% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of MNST shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
